attributes.action: to stop imagrants coming into the country from getting priorty on housing over britsh citzens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
imgrants that come into the country get put on top of the housing asotation list get their electricity bills payed, free gardeing service ect
they should not get free gardening service, their electricty bills paid fore ect 
i futher petition the priminster to sotp imgrants getting their tv licenced payed for. this is not fair on the brittish people and imagrants should have the same privalges as a british citizen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
